item.title: sxhkd
item.description: Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Caption. Gaps, borders and opacity have been exagerated for aesthetic purposes. More pictures of the config here. -------------------------------------------------------------------- “sxhkd is an X daemon that reacts to input events by executing commands.” Table of Content. The files The config Some resources Dependencies Manual installation process -------------------------------------------------------------------- The Files. All files are available at ~/.config/alacritty: [alacritty.
item.content:
Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

More pictures of the config here.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

“sxhkd is an X daemon that reacts to input events by executing commands.”
